name: Espiritu Roboto (TALP)
description:
This text adventure was written for Text Adventure Literacy Jam 2022. Made with Adventuron. This was my first game! Thanks to: Dee Cooke, Tristin Grizel, Chris Merriner, Josh Goebel, @goingbadly, and Amari for playtesting.

  • Difficulty: Easy
  • Parser: Verb Noun
Downloading
  1. Hit the download button below
  2. Save the file
  3. (On PC) Locate it with your file explorer (File Manager for Windows, Finder for Mac). Double click it. The file should open in your default browser.
  4. (On Android) Locate it in your downloads folder. Press it. If it asks which app to use, choose your internet browser.
